snippet: Ms. Lavin, 77, tells musical stories with a sense of humor and an upbeat philosophy in her latest show.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews cabaret performance by Broadway singer and actress Linda Lavin at 54 Below.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Lavin, 77, tells musical stories with a sense of humor and an upbeat philosophy in her latest show.

headline.main: Review: Linda Lavin, Scratching Out Fresh Starts, at 54 Below
